So This Is Christmas

Ano: 2013

Sinopse: Ashley is 18 and her life is heading in the wrong direction. Seeking an escape from the drama at home, she's been hanging with a bad crowd. Things start to change when a handyman working on her family's house encourages her to volunteer for a Christmas play with underprivileged children. She finds purpose in helping people in need and uses that to help heal her troubled family, who together discover the impact that one person can make through the gift of giving.—Anonymous
